buckle
  • Reference

Dropdown Menu

A Bootstrap dropdown menu.

dropdown(button = NULL, links = NULL, ...)

Arguments

button

A button to trigger the dropdown, see button.
links

A list of tags$a elements.
...

Additional named arguments passed on as HTML attributes.

Examples

# A dropdown without `id` attribute
#   - standard `tags$a` utility
dropdown(
  button("Secondary"),
  list(
    tags$a(href = "#", "Option 1"),
    tags$a(href = "3", "Option 2")
  )
)
#> <div class="dropdown buckle-dropdown">
#>   <div class="buckle-button input-group dropdown-toggle" data-count="0" data-toggle="dropdown">
#>     <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button">Secondary</button>
#>   </div>
#>   <div class="dropdown-menu">
#>     <a href="#" class="dropdown-item">Option 1</a>
#>     <a href="3" class="dropdown-item">Option 2</a>
#>   </div>
#> </div>

# A dropdown with `id` attribute
#   - `tags$a` now act similar `shiny::actionButton`
#   - when `tags$a` clicked `input$flavor` will have `href` value
#   - default `tags$a` behavior suppressed
dropdown(
  id = "flavor",
  button("Ice cream flavors"),
  list(
    tags$a(href = "vanilla", "Vanilla"),
    tags$a(href = "chocolate", "Chocolate"),
    tags$a(href = "mint", "Mint")
  )
)
#> <div class="dropdown buckle-dropdown" id="flavor">
#>   <div class="buckle-button input-group dropdown-toggle" data-count="0" data-toggle="dropdown">
#>     <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button">Ice cream flavors</button>
#>   </div>
#>   <div class="dropdown-menu">
#>     <a href="vanilla" class="dropdown-item">Vanilla</a>
#>     <a href="chocolate" class="dropdown-item">Chocolate</a>
#>     <a href="mint" class="dropdown-item">Mint</a>
#>   </div>
#> </div>
